name: Abdur Razzak
description: Known as Nayak Raj, he was one of the most iconic actors in Bangladeshi cinema.

name: Suchanda
description: A celebrated actress and director, also the wife of Zahir Raihan, a legendary filmmaker.

name: Anwar Hossain
description: Referred to as the 'Uncrowned Emperor of Bangladeshi Cinema,' renowned for his intense acting.

name: Shabnam
description: A versatile actress known for her work in both Bangladeshi and Pakistani cinema.

name: Kohinoor Akhter Shuchanda
description: An acclaimed actress and sister of actors Bobita and Champa, with a significant impact on Dhallywood.

name: Bulbul Ahmed
description: A prominent actor remembered for his versatile performances in classic Bangladeshi films.

name: Bobita
description: An internationally acclaimed actress, particularly known for her role in Satyajit Ray's 'Ashani Sanket.'

name: Ferdousi Mazumder
description: Renowned for her work in both films and television dramas, she is a highly respected figure in Bangladeshi entertainment.

name: Rahman
description: A versatile actor who gained fame for his charming personality and impressive performances.

name: Anwara
description: A celebrated actress in Dhallywood, known for her exceptional acting in both leading and supporting roles.
